text: Visualise and apply many ease/tween functions
is a ;arge collection of tween/ease functions.
These have been converted to VEX and are available in the
file. This node is a convenient list of the 100+ functions and their arguments.
The VEXpression is evaluated on a line in the 0->1 domain if no input is wired.
